EmailTemplate.name: Production Return Order Request Pre Customer Shipment
EmailTemplate.subject: Production Return Order Request {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
To process your Production Return Order request, we need you to complete the following steps:
1. Generate a zero dollar Purchase Order to authorize us to work on your unit. 2. Ship the Production Return Unit back to the Original Manufacturing Site and make sure your shipment contains: 路 Defected/Damaged unit, 路 Zero-dollar Purchase Order with: Honeywell entity address, rework PO number, Honeywell P/N & S/N , Quantity, Bill to, Customer delivery address and Carrier and freight details, 路 Rejection report/ reason for return, 路 Include {!Case.CaseNumber}.
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
